method.name: Evolutionary Instance Selection enhanced by Rough set based Feature Selection

reference.ref: J. Derrac, C. Cornelis, S. Garcia, F. Herrera , Enhancing Evolutionary Instance Selection Algorithms by means of Fuzzy Rough Set based Feature Selection. Information Sciences 186:1 (2012) 73-92

generalDescription.type: Rough Set and Evolutionary based learning algorithm
generalDescription.howWork: EIS_RFS is a hybrid method for feature selection (based on Fuzzy Rough Set theory) and instance selection (using a Steady-State Genetic Algorithm). Both preprocessing techniques are applied to obtain different reduced training sets, which are improved throughout the search in a wrapper-like way.

parameterSpec.param: K Value: K parameter in the k-NN classifier.
SizePop: Size of the population of the genetic algorithm.
MaxEvaluations: Maximum number of evaluations in the genetic algorithm.
Init: Probability of initializing each gen with a '1' in the chromosomes.
Alpha: Alpha balancing parameter of the fitness function.
MutProb: Mutation probability of the genetic algorithm, per bit.
MaxGamma: Maximum Gamma value in the feature selection procedure.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: EIS_RFS-C Dataset: iris Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= iris Fold 0 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.03333333333333333 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.03333333333333333 Correctly classified: 0.9666666666666667 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= iris Summary of data, Classifiers: iris Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.9851851851851852 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9777777777777777 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.9925925925925926 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9851851851851852 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.9851851851851852 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9777777777777777 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.9851851851851852 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.9777777777777777 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.9851851851851852 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.018518518518518517 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.007590333900710815 Correctly classified: 0.9814814814814815 Global N/C: 0.0
